borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">The proposed development introduces an uncharacteristic
and unsympathetic addition, harmful to the character of the&nbsp;dwellinghouse, terrace and the Becontree Estate. It will also lead to the formation of an undersized and inadequate bedroom. As such the proposal
is considered contrary to:</span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">-&nbsp;</span><font face="Arial, sans-serif">National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (MHCLG, February 2019);<br></font><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- Policies 7.1, 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of&nbsp;</span><font face="Arial, sans-serif">The London Plan: Spatial Development Strategy for London&nbsp;</font><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">(GLA, consolidated with alterations since 2011, published March&nbsp;</span><font face="Arial, sans-serif">2016);<br>-&nbsp;</font><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Policies D1 and D4 of the&nbsp;</span><font face="Arial, sans-serif">Draft London Plan (Intend to Publish version December 2019)<br></font><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- Policies&nbsp;CP2 and
CP3 of the&nbsp;</span><font face="Arial, sans-serif">Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<br>-&nbsp;</font><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Policies BP2 and BP11 of the&nbsp;</span><font face="Arial, sans-serif">Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide&nbsp;</font><font face="Arial, sans-serif">Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)</font><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">; and<br></span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- Policies DM11, DM14, DM16&nbsp;and SP4 of the&nbsp;</span><font face="Arial, sans-serif">The London Borough of Barking and Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local&nbsp;</font><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Plan (Regulation 18 Consultation Version, November 2019)<br></span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Residential Extensions and Alterations (SPD) (February 2012)<br></span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">- Technical housing standards - nationally described space standard (2015).&nbsp;</span></p>
description: Erection of a part first floor rear extension.
